title: Marketo vendor specific opportunity

marketo:name.title: Opportunity Name
marketo:name.description: Subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order or company name, for the opportunity.

marketo:description.title: Opportunity Description
marketo:description.description: Additional information to describe the opportunity, such as possible products to sell or past purchases from the customer.

marketo:stage.title: Opportunity Stage
marketo:stage.description: Sales stage of this opportunity to aid the sales team in their efforts to win this opportunity.

marketo:fiscalQuarter.title: Account targeted Indicator
marketo:fiscalQuarter.description: Indicator whether the Account is targeted.

marketo:fiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
marketo:fiscalYear.description: Indicator whether the Account record is deleted or not.

marketo:fiscal.title: Fiscal
marketo:fiscal.description: Indicator whether the Account record is deleted or not.

marketo:forcastCategory.title: Forecast Category
marketo:forcastCategory.description: Forecast Category determined by the opportunity Stage value eg: omitted,pipeline,bestcase,commit,closed.

marketo:forecastCategoryName.title: Forecast Category Name
marketo:forecastCategoryName.description: Forecast category name that is displayed in reports for a perticular forecast category.

marketo:hasOpportunityLineItem.title: Has Opportunity Line Item
marketo:hasOpportunityLineItem.description: Flag to indicate whether this opportunity have more line items.

marketo:isClosed.title: Closed
marketo:isClosed.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is closed.

marketo:isWon.title: Won
marketo:isWon.description: Flag indicating if this opportunity is Won.

marketo:probability.title: Probability
marketo:probability.description: Likelihood that opportunity will close, stated as a percentage.

marketo:expectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
marketo:expectedRevenue.description: Calculated revenue based on the Amount and Probability.

marketo:quantity.title: Quantity
marketo:quantity.description: Total of all Quantity field values for all products in the Products related list if the opportunity has products. General use field if the opportunity does not have products.

marketo:closeDate.title: Close Date
marketo:closeDate.description: Date when you plan to close the opportunity.

marketo:lastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
marketo:lastActivityDate.description: Date last activity happened on this opportunity.

marketo:leadSource.title: Lead Source
marketo:leadSource.description: Source of the opportunity, for example, Advertisement, Partner, or Web

marketo:nextStep.title: Next Step
marketo:nextStep.description: Description of next task in closing opportunity.
